methods.makeRegion:
Get a new or re-usable column region appropriate for this source.

:param columnDefinition: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ColumnDefinition<?>) - The ColumnDefinition
:param columnLocation: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.locations.ColumnLocation) - The ColumnLocation
:param regionIndex: (int) - The index of the region to add.
:return: (MakeRegion.REGION_TYPE) A new or re-usable column region appropriate for this source and the supplied parameters. A null value
         may be returned, which should be interpreted to mean use a special null column, which has size() 0 and is
         full of the appropriate "null" value for the column's type.
